info.name: Delta Share - Metrics API
info.description: API collection for extracting Databricks pipeline and job run metrics

query.description: Optional ISO timestamp (e.g., '2024-01-23T10:30:00Z'). If provided, returns runs from this timestamp onwards. If not provided, returns all runs.

request.description: Extract pipeline run metrics for a specific pipeline. Retrieves comprehensive metrics including pipeline info, run details, timing information, and error messages for failed runs.

item.name: Get Pipeline Run Metrics (With Timestamp Filter)

query.description: ISO timestamp - returns runs from this timestamp onwards

request.description: Extract pipeline run metrics filtered by start timestamp. Returns only runs that occurred after the specified timestamp.

query.description: Optional ISO timestamp (e.g., '2024-01-23T10:30:00Z'). If provided, returns runs from this timestamp onwards. If not provided, returns all runs.

request.description: Extract job run metrics for all jobs associated with a pipeline. Retrieves job information, run details, timing, schedule info, and error messages.

item.name: Get Job Run Metrics (With Timestamp Filter)

query.description: ISO timestamp - returns runs from this timestamp onwards

request.description: Extract job run metrics filtered by start timestamp. Returns only job runs that occurred after the specified timestamp.
